clearPuzzleConfirm: Ini akan kembalikan permainan ini smula dan menghapuskan semua blok awak yang ditambah atau ditukar.
clearPuzzleConfirmHeader: Adakah anda pasti anda ingin bermula?
completedWithoutRecommendedBlock: Tahniah! Anda telah menyelesaikan permainan {puzzleNumber} ini. (Tetapi anda boleh menggunakan blok lain untuk membuat kod yang lebih baik.)
dropletBlock_assign_x_description: Assigns a value to an existing variable. For example, x = 0;
dropletBlock_assign_x_param0_description: The variable name being assigned to
dropletBlock_assign_x_param1_description: The value the variable is being assigned to.
dropletBlock_callMyFunction_description: Calls a named function that takes no parameters
dropletBlock_callMyFunction_n_descriptio: Calls a named function that takes one or more parameters
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_array_1_4_d: Create a variable and initialize it as an array
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_array_1_4_p: The name you will use in the program to reference the variable
The initial values to the array
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_array_1_4_s: Declare a variable assigned to an array
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_description: Create a variable for the first time
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_param0_desc: The name you will use in the program to reference the variable
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_param1_desc: The initial value of the variable
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_prompt_desc: Create a variable and assign it a value by displaying a prompt
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_prompt_para: The name you will use in the program to reference the variable
The string the user will see in the pop up when asked to enter a value
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_prompt_sign: Prompt the user for a value and store it
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_promptNum_d: Declares that the code will now use a variable and assign it an initial numerical value provided by the user
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_promptNum_p: The name you will use in the program to reference the variable
The string the user will see in the pop up when asked to enter a value
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_promptNum_s: Prompt the user for a numerical value and store it
dropletBlock_declareNoAssign_x_descripti: Declares a variable with the given name after 'var'
dropletBlock_equalityOperator_param0_des: The first value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_equalityOperator_param1_des: The second value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_functionParams_n_descriptio: A set of statements that takes in one or more parameters, and performs a task or calculate a value when the function is called
dropletBlock_functionParams_none_descrip: A set of statements that perform a task or calculate a value when the function is called
dropletBlock_getTime_description: Get the current time in milliseconds
dropletBlock_greaterThanOperator_param0_: The first value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_greaterThanOperator_param1_: The second value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_ifBlock_description: Do something only if a condition is true
dropletBlock_ifElseBlock_description: Do something if a condition is true, otherwise do something else
dropletBlock_inequalityOperator_param0_d: The first value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_inequalityOperator_param1_d: The second value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_lessThanOperator_param0_des: The first value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_lessThanOperator_param1_des: The second value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_mathMax_param0_description: One or more numbers to compare.
dropletBlock_mathMin_param0_description: One or more numbers to compare.
dropletBlock_mathRandom_description: Pulangkan nombor rawak bermula dari 0 (termasuk) hingga tetapi tidak termasuk 1 (eksklusif)
dropletBlock_randomNumber_description: Returns a random number in the closed range from min to max.
dropletBlock_return_description: Return a value from a function
dropletBlock_whileBlock_description: Repeat something while a condition is true
emptyBlockInFunction: The function {name} has an unfilled input.
emptyBlockInVariable: The variable {name} has an unfilled input.
emptyBlocksErrorMsg: "Ulangan" atau "Jika" blok perlu mempunyai blok lain di dalamnya untuk berfungsi. Pastikan blok dalaman sesuai di dalam kandungan blok.
emptyExampleBlockErrorMsg: You need at least one example in function {functionName}. Make sure each example has a call and a result.
emptyFunctionBlocksErrorMsg: Blok fungsi perlu mengandungi blok-blok yang lain di dalamnya untuk berfungsi.
emptyFunctionalBlock: You have a block with an unfilled input.
emptyTopLevelBlock: There are no blocks to run. You must attach a block to the {topLevelBlockName} block.
errorEmptyFunctionBlockModal: There need to be blocks inside your function definition. Click "edit" and drag blocks inside the green block.
errorIncompleteBlockInFunction: Click "edit" to make sure you don't have any blocks missing inside your function definition.
errorParamInputUnattached: Remember to attach a block to each parameter input on the function block in your workspace.
errorRequiredParamsMissing: Create a parameter for your function by clicking "edit" and adding the necessary parameters. Drag the new parameter blocks into your function definition.
errorUnusedFunction: You created a function, but never used it on your workspace! Click on "Functions" in the toolbox and make sure you use it in your program.
errorUnusedParam: You added a parameter block, but didn't use it in the definition. Make sure to use your parameter by clicking "edit" and placing the parameter block inside the green block.
exampleErrorMessage: The function {functionName} has one or more examples that need adjusting. Make sure they match your definition and answer the question.
examplesFailedOnClose: One or more of your examples do not match your definition. Check your examples before closing
extraTopBlocks: You have unattached blocks. Did you mean to attach these to the "when run" block?
extraTopBlocksWhenRun: You have unattached blocks. Did you mean to attach these to the "when run" block?
finalStage: Tahniah! Anda telah melengkapkan peringkat akhir.
finalStageTrophies: Tahniah! Anda telah selesai peringkat akhir dan memenangi {numTrophies, plural, one {a trophy} other {# trophies}}.
generatedCodeInfo: Universiti terkemuka juga mengajarkan blok-asas koding (cth., {berkeleyLink}, {harvardLink}). Tetapi, blok yang telah disusun juga boleh ditunjukkan dalam JavaScript, bahasa koding yang paling meluas digunakan:
hashError: Maaf, '%1' tidak sepadan dengan sebarang atur cara yang disimpan.
levelIncompleteError: Anda menggunakan kesemua jenis blok yang diperlukan tetapi dengan cara yang tidak betul.
missingRecommendedBlocksErrorMsg: Not quite. Try using a block you aren’t using yet.
missingRequiredBlocksErrorMsg: Not quite. You have to use a block you aren’t using yet.
nestedForSameVariable: You're using the same variable inside two or more nested loops. Use unique variable names to avoid infinite loops.
nextLevelTrophies: Tahniah! Anda telah menyelesaikan Puzzle {puzzleNumber} dan memenangi {numTrophies, plural, one {a trophy} other {# trophies}}.
nextStageTrophies: Tahniah! Anda telah menyelesaikan {stageName} dan memenangi {numTrophies, plural, one {a trophy} other {# trophies}}.
numBlocksNeeded: Tahniah! Anda melengkapkan Puzzle {puzzleNumber}. (Walau bagaimanapun, anda hanya boleh menggunakan {numBlocks, plural, one {1 block} other {# blocks}}.)
numLinesOfCodeWritten: Anda baru sahaja menulis {numLines, plural, one {1 line} other {# lines}} kod!
orientationLock: Matikan kunci orientasi dalam tetapan peranti.
recommendedBlockContextualHintTitle: Try using a block like this to solve the puzzle.
runTooltip: Jalankan program yang ditetapkan dengan blok dalam ruang kerja.
runtimeErrorMsg: Your program did not run successfully. Please remove line {lineNumber} and try again.
shareFailure: Maaf, kami tidak dapat berkongsi program ini.
shareWarningsAge: Please provide your age below and click OK to continue.
shareWarningsStoreData: This app built on Code Studio stores data that could be viewed by anyone with this sharing link, so be careful if you are asked to provide personal information.
submitYourProjectConfirm: You cannot edit your project after submitting it, really submit?
unsubmitYourProjectConfirm: Unsubmitting your project will reset the submitted date, really unsubmit?
subtitle: persekitaran pengaturcaraan visual
syntaxErrorMsg: Your program contains a typo. Please remove line {lineNumber} and try again.
toggleBlocksErrorMsg: Anda perlu membetulkan kesilapan di dalam program sebelum ia boleh dipaparkan sebagai blok-blok.
tooFewBlocksMsg: Anda menggunakan semua jenis blok yang diperlukan, cuba gunakan lebih banyak jenis blok untuk menyelesaikan puzzle ini.
tooManyBlocksMsg: Puzzle ini dapat diselesaikan dengan <x id='START_SPAN'/><x id='END_SPAN'/> blok.
tooMuchWork: Anda membuatkan saya melakukan banyak kerja! Bolehkah anda cuba ulang beberapa kali sahaja?
totalNumLinesOfCodeWritten: Total masa keseluruhan: {numLines, plural, one {1 line} other {# lines}} kod.
tryBlocksBelowFeedback: Try using one of the blocks below:
unnamedFunction: You have a variable or function that does not have a name. Don't forget to give everything a descriptive name.
dropletBlock_comment_description: Write a description of some code
